purpose.description: Observes system signals and emits alerts within defined thresholds. Performs no remediation actions and does not modify systems.

risk_profile.notes: Primary risk is false positives/negatives in alerting. No direct operational side effects are permitted.

stopping_authority.mechanism: Disable alerting pipeline and revoke monitoring token via admin controls. Observer continues no-ops if detached from streams.

audit_surface.notes: Alert events and threshold triggers are logged. Internal anomaly scoring may be partially opaque depending on the detector implementation.
